explains: v. 加速，促进（行为，过程）

sentences.en: We tried to help you expedite your plans.
sentences.cn: 我们试图帮你加快你的计划。

sentences.en: We have developed rapid order processing to expedite deliveries to customers.
sentences.cn: 我们已创造了快速处理订单的方法以便迅速将货物送达顾客。

sentences.en: The facilitating agencies expedite the clearance of international cargo.
sentences.cn: 中介机构加快国际货物清关。
